author: Morgan Gstalter
title: Actress Evangeline Lilly apologizes for 'dismissive, arrogant' coronavirus message after refusing self-isolation
description: Actress Evangeline Lilly apologized for what she called the "insensitivity" she showed earlier this month by initially refusing to self-quarantine during the ongoing coronavirus pandemic, saying she is now doin...
content: Actress Evangeline Lilly apologized for what she called the insensitivity she showed earlier this month by initially refusing to self-quarantine during the ongoing coronavirus pandemic, saying she is now doing her part to flatten the curve" by practicing soci… [+2605 chars]
